Title: South Korea in Political Crisis after Impeached President Resists Arrest
Description: Islam Times - South Korea’s political leadership was in uncharted territory Saturday after the sitting president resisted arrest over a failed martial law decree days before the warrant expires.

Title: Trump's Republicans Reelect Mike Johnson US House Speaker despite Dissent
Description: Islam Times - US House of Representatives Speaker Mike Johnson was reelected to the chamber's top job on Friday by a razor-thin margin that highlighted potential fissures among US President-elect Donald Trump's Republicans on Capitol Hill.

Title: PMU Chief Says; Victories in Fight against ISIL Indebted to Gen. Soleimani
Description: Islam Times - The chairman of Iraq's Popular Mobilization Units (PMU) has praised the substantial assistance rendered by Iran in the fight against Daesh terrorists.

Title: Baghdad Reacts to Israel Attacks on Tents of Displaced People
Description: Islam Times - The spokesperson for the Iraqi government, Bassem Al-Awadi, has denounced the attack by the Zionist regime on the tents of displaced Palestinians in the Al-Mawasi area of southern Khan Younis.

Title: French, German FMs Visit Damascus to Meet HTS Group
Description: Islam Times - The French and German foreign ministers have arrived in Damascus to meet HTS members, marking the first trip by top European Union officials to the country since the fall of former president Bashar al-Assad last last month.

Title: Russia’s Intel Agency: West Does not Rule Out Ukrainian Defense Collapse Soon
Description: Islam Times - West notes Ukraine’s reduced capability to withstand the Russian army and does not rule out the collapse of the Ukrainian army’s defenses soon, the press office of Russia’s Foreign Intelligence Service (SVR) said.

Title: China Urges US to Stop Using 'Taiwan Card'
Description: Islam Times - The United States must stop using the 'Taiwan card' and destabilizing the region, as it will lose facing the 'force of China,' Chinese Ambassador to Russia Zhang Hanhui told Sputnik.

Title: Netanyahu Orders Israel Negotiators to Continue in Doha
Description: Islam Times - Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu has authorized the regime’s negotiators to continue talks in Qatar to secure a deal with Hamas aimed at releasing the captives still held in Gaza.

Title: Palestinian Detainees Reveal 'Systematic Torture' in Israeli Naqab Prison
Description: Islam Times - Shocking new testimonies from Palestinian detainees have exposed 'systematic torture and abuse' at Israel's Naqab prison, with reports of torture techniques including the spread of scabies and brutal physical mistreatment.

Title: Israeli Airstrikes on Gaza Kill at Least 26 People, Wounds Dozens More
Description: Islam Times - Israeli military airstrikes on the Gaza Strip have killed at least 26 people and injured several others, with some reports indicating that the death toll could rise.

Title: Iran's Ambassador Discusses Detained Nationals with Italy's Foreign Ministry
Description: Islam Times - Iranian Ambassador Mohammad Reza Sabouri met with Italy's Foreign Ministry Secretary-General Riccardo Guariglia in Rome to address consular matters and the cases of detained nationals, including Mohammad Abedini and Cecilia Sala.

Title: Israeli Strikes on Gaza Kill Two Journalists, Bringing Toll to 203
Description: Islam Times - The death toll of Palestinian journalists killed in Israeli airstrikes on Gaza has reached at least 203, following the deaths of two more reporters in separate incidents.
